mapper.insert: insert into t_ordersetting (id, orderDate, number, reservations) VALUES (#{id},#{orderDate},#{number},#{reservations})
mapper.update: update t_ordersetting set number = #{number} where orderDate = #{orderDate}
mapper.select: select * from t_ordersetting where orderDate between #{start} and #{end}
select number from t_ordersetting where orderDate = #{orderDate}
